# Exiles

## Pronunciation
/ˈeɡ.zaɪl/


## Meanings

### Noun

The state of being banished from one's home or country.

> He lived in exile.

banishment

---

Someone who is banished from their home or country.

> She lived as an exile.

expat, expatriate

### Verb

To send into exile.

banish, forban




exiles
